alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:08PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dona Ana County through 445 PM MDT... At 407 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorm along I-10 from Anthony to Las Cruces. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anthony, Las Cruces, Vado, NMSU Main Campus, Berino, Mesquite, San Miguel, Chamberino, Mesilla, La Mesa, Talavera, East Mesa, High Valley, San Pablo and Northeast Las Cruces. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 141 and 163. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 8. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
